fields.text: Welcome to ClassPass, the all-access membership granting you unlimited fitness studio classes worldwide.
To book or manage your fitness classes, press [INDEX].
To schedule a new class, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our class scheduling team.
For membership and account inquiries, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with a membership specialist.
For studio owner inquiries and technical support, press [INDEX].
If you are a studio owner interested in joining ClassPass, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with our partnerships team.
For technical support with our platform, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to technical support.
